p: The animals were closely observed for any behavioral changes, toxicity signs and mortality, immediately after feeding of composite sample ( Azin, Fuin, Spin and Lain) then after half hour, 4 h, 1 day, 2 day and then once a day for 14 days, all observation including skin changing, irritation of eyes and mucus membranes, convulsion tremors, sluggishness, diarrhea, salivations, sleep, coma as well as mortality rate was recorded.
